TextLibrary.Text: I don't think we'll need to come back here for a while.
I don't think we'll need to come back here for a while.
Why? Did they give you the device?
You mean they already gave you the device?
No, but I was given directions explaining how to assemble it.
No, but I was given directions explaining how to assemble it.
Well, what do we need to do first?
Great, just what we needed, more tasks to complete with no reward in sight. Oh well, what is it we need to do?
I've assigned ED and Lydia to some information gathering for some later tasks. In the meantime we need to purchase a Cobalt Magnifier from Ceti CPUs.
I've assigned ED and Lydia to some information gathering for some later tasks. In the meantime we need to purchase a Cobalt Magnifier from Ceti CPUs.
Wait, we need to purchase it? I thought Nasty Butler was a billionaire.
This better not be too expensive.

Yes, he is rich, but he is also eccentric. Furthermore, I get the feeling his branch is trying to give away its assets. For whatever reason, Nasty Butler suspects he will soon lose access to his fortune.
I'm sure the payoff from the end product will be well worth the component cost.
Let's head to the Ceti System then.
Let's head to the Ceti System then.
